calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 81 in today's
episode I have a new word for you and
hibbett let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation inhibit sometimes you can't
do something that you are willing to it
could be due to many reasons maybe you
are shy or embarrassed to do it or it
could be something that stops or
restricts you from doing it the word
inhibit basically means something that
prevents oneself from doing something
due to their shyness or the fear of
facing embarrassment or due to some
restrictions applied when you restrain
or suppress yourself from behaving in a
particular manner or you are holding
yourself back from speaking something it
means you are inhibiting yourself this
could be because you are extremely shy
or embarrassed the action of inhibiting
is known as inhibition it is a feeling
that makes one self-conscious and unable
to behave in a relaxed and a natural
manner for example when you are
performing on the stage for the first
time you feel very shy you are inhibited
from doing your best
it means you find it difficult to lose
your inhibitions and give it your best
shot
as the word inhibit shows the action of
restricting or forbidding it is a verb
okay now that you know what inhibit
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example 1 Maria
had no inhibitions and spoke boldly
about her divorce to her friends example
2 the high rate of interest on home
loans has inhibited James and Lisa from
taking a bank loan to buy a new
apartment example 3 after a couple of
drinks William and Peter lost all their
inhibitions and started talking and
laughing loudly at their friend's party
example 4 Katherine is on the weight
loss program and finds it very difficult
to inhibit herself from eating burgers
example 5 lack of hospitals and health
care centers in the village inhibited
the poor from getting medical facilities
whenever they required it
example six mother told Little John you
shouldn't allow the fear of failure to
inhibit you from riah tempting your
exams example seven to inhibit any
further argument andrea threatened her
son of being locked in a dark room
example eight the stern voice of the
teacher inhibits all the students from
approaching her when they have any
queries example nine drinking coffee in
excess and hibbott the absorption of
iron from your diet that's the end of
today's episode when was the last time
you were inhibited from doing something
and why kindly share your experiences in
the comment box below this video thank
you for watching us do watch all the
episodes of daily video vocabulary to
better your English language skills do
